channel.title: Hand Cannon
channel.description: Ok, well basically I put hand cannon into my game with 602+ anims so I don't have the blinking glitch. But I don't know if I have to create my own gfx of the cannons shot hurdling towards a person/npc..If so, how could I do this?If not, it would be helpful if someone could show me how to get the Gfx ID. THanks.

item.title: Hand Cannon
item.dc:creator: @blo0d_pker blo0d pker
